result: {"id":1752251211070,"target":"ideation-16","section":"ideation","text":"Is there a way for us to put all this in the upfront so we're alerted to trends that are relevant to the audience? {"id":1752245114419,"target":"creation-21","section":"creation","text":"Please see my comments before. {"id":1752245051942,"target":"ideation-11","section":"ideation","text":"As I've said before.  The magic comes from using AI tools, world class creative and advanced earned strategies.  The way this sounds is the idea comes from AI, is human refined and then AI refined.  Humans need to originate based on trending insights, AI iterate, and humans craft into final idea.","type":"comment","priority":"low","timestamp":"2025-07-11T14:44:11.942Z","author":"Stu","email":null,"context":{"type":"paragraph","text":"Creative team evaluation, concept refinement, and approval process with feedback loop to AI models for continuous improvement.","section":"ideation"},"parentId":null,"replies":[]}

{"id":1752244763555,"target":"null","section":"functional-spec","text":"See previous comment","type":"comment","priority":"low","timestamp":"2025-07-11T14:39:23.555Z","author":"Stu","email":null,"context":{"type":"list item","text":"Text-to-Image/Video AI: Integration with DALL-E, Midjourney, RunwayML","section":"functional-spec"},"parentId":null,"replies":[]}

{"id":1752244720166,"target":"null","section":"prd","text":"I do have reservations.  As part of the DJE creative community - who is aware of and testing AI production tools like Runway, we have strict guidance on which tools and how those tools are used in the creative process.  Generative image and video tools are exploding in capability. but: not all tools are created equal, and not all use cases ar appropriate. Edelman and DJE studio has built a clear structure for how and when to use these tools across the network.  There is a no magic button to create amazing work in AI.  The magic comes from using numerous AI tools, world class creative and advanced production techniques.  We take a right-managed approach for all our inputs to best control the generative output.","type":"comment","priority":"low","timestamp":"2025-07-11T14:38:40.166Z","author":"Stu","email":null,"context":{"type":"list item","text":"Asset evaluation scoring algorithm for performance prediction","section":"prd"},"parentId":null,"replies":[]}

{"id":1752244166105,"target":"null","section":"prd","text":"This makes it sound like the ideas generated by AI are final.  They should be creative prompts, sparks, thought starters to build off not take as final.  Some people will take this as the only way to ideate and that's not the point of this. It's to offer creative stimuli, new thinking, not the only thinking.  We must be careful how we position this.  It is about co-existence.  I believe it needs some degree of original input to start that it can iterate off","type":"comment","priority":"low","timestamp":"2025-07-11T14:29:26.105Z","author":"Stu","email":null,"context":{"type":"list item","text":"Multi-concept ideation with strategic rationale and message translation","section":"prd"},"parentId":null,"replies":[]}

{"id":1752243884528,"target":"null","section":"overview","text":"I think we need to broaden the brands/sectors to make this as relevant to tech, health, corporate clients as well as the 'cool-er' household brands","type":"comment","priority":"low","timestamp":"2025-07-11T14:24:44.528Z","author":"Stu","email":null,"context":{"type":"reply","text":"Replying to JESS: \"Nike felt a little random to me - do we want to include other Zeno brands?\""},"parentId":"1752159146247","replies":[]}

{"id":1752243801109,"target":"overview-1","section":"overview","text":"To make this as appealing to health clients as FMCG clients, I would broaden it's scope to include detecting emerging conversations as well as trends","type":"comment","priority":"low","timestamp":"2025-07-11T14:23:21.109Z","author":"Stu","email":null,"context":{"type":"heading","text":"Executive Summary","section":"overview"},"parentId":null,"replies":[]}

{"id":1752180543885,"target":"detection-23","section":"detection","text":"Just calling this out here. \n\nPeak Metrics is built on what they call Workspaces.
